name: Elie

services.title: Arduino programming
services.description: I have a strong interest in electronics and have gained through multiple personal projects a noticeable amount of skills in Arduino.

services.title: VR/AR Software Development
services.description: Proficient in VR/AR development with experience in Unreal Engine, Unity, C#, and Blender. Created VR educational software for Meta Quest, benefiting over 100 students at SUU. Active in VR student club and user meetings.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I have expertise in full-stack web development with expertise in PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and SQL, using frameworks like React and Node.js. Notable projects include the Health Web App with a Diet Tracking feature and the School Management Website for managing student admissions, payments, and grades.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.
